title: Lucid, Activision, EA, Uber: Here's where Saudi Arabia's sovereign wealth fund has invested
description: The largest public market bets by Saudi Arabia's secretive PIF include experiential-focused firms like LiveNation, as well as gaming bets like Electronic Arts.

title: The 'Bitcoin Family' has a special algorithm that tracks moon cycles — and it's helped them gain 50% since the bear market bottom
description: Didi Taihuttu's custom-built indicator considers a mix of inputs, including directional trading data and moon cycles.

title: 'After the war, they will be a member': Russia’s neighbors back Ukraine's NATO bid at summit
description: The leaders of Europe's Baltic states on Tuesday rallied behind Ukraine's NATO membership bid.

title: Microsoft-Activision deal moves closer as judge denies FTC injunction request
description: The U.S. government can now appeal the judge's decision.

title: Erdogan's push for Turkey's EU membership is being met with surprise and skepticism
description: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan shocked many on Monday by linking Sweden's bid to join NATO with his country's accession to the EU.

title: HP joins United Airlines in sponsoring Wrexham, the Welsh soccer club owned by Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney
description: Wrexham AFC, the small Welsh soccer club owned by Hollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, on Tuesday announced new sponsorship.

title: Singapore's Temasek says it's not looking to invest in crypto firms amid current regulatory uncertainties
description: Singapore's sovereign wealth fund Temasek Holdings is currently not looking to invest in crypto companies amid regulatory uncertainty in the sector.

title: Putin went to war for 'less NATO,' military alliance chief says — and that's backfired
description: Russia's war in Ukraine has helped enlarge NATO, Jens Stoltenberg said, a day after Turkey endorsed Sweden's membership bid.

title: The No. 1 destination to live and work abroad, according to expats
description: 90% of expats are happy with their life abroad in this country, versus 72% globally.

title: Thailand PM Prayuth Chan-ocha to retire from politics, nine years after seizing power in a coup
description: Thai Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha, the former military general who seized power in a 2014 coup, on Tuesday said he will retire from politics.

title: Mortgage rates in Britain hit 15-year high — with many fearful there's more misery to come
description: A key mortgage rate in the U.K. has climbed to its highest level for 15 years, deepening fears of a looming catastrophe for struggling households.

title: Apple launches online store on China's giant WeChat messaging app
description: WeChat is China's biggest messaging platform with over 1.2 billion users and opens another retail channel for Apple to sell its products.

title: Singapore state investor Temasek posts negative annual return, its first since 2020
description: Its global direct investments, particularly in technology, healthcare and payments, saw "a reversal of gains" in the 12 months ending March 31 this year.

title: India's IDFC First Bank says merger will boost credit growth
description: Last week, IDFC First Bank said its board had approved its merger with IDFC Ltd., the latest in a wave of consolidation in India's financial sector.

title: Chinese real estate stocks rise as Beijing extends property support measures
description: The move encourages financial institutions to continue deferring loan payments, while propping up financial support for real estate enterprises

title: 'Tourflation'? Taylor Swift, Beyoncé and Bruce Springsteen could be making inflation worse
description: As inflation remains high in many countries around the world, economists have found themselves considering a surprising potential contributor: music concerts.

title: One of Asia’s most luxurious trains is returning to the rails with a new route
description: Belmond announced today that the Eastern & Oriental Express luxury train, which will run from Singapore to Malaysia, is restarting in February 2024.

title: Sweden's path to NATO membership cleared after Turkey greenlights bid
description: NATO said Sweden and Turkey have cooperated closely to address the latter's security concerns since last year's summit.

title: Microsoft confirms more job cuts on top of 10,000 layoffs announced in January
description: On top of the 10,000 layoffs that Microsoft announced in January, the company is now slimming down its number of salespeople.

title: Central banks in Asia could soon diverge from the Fed, Nomura says
description: "After China, Korea, India and even Indonesia could cut rates ahead of the Fed, due to faster disinflation, weak demand and higher real rates," Nomura economists wrote.
